snippet: As Mayor Bill de Blasio ordered an investigation into the death of Myls Dobson, 4, prosecutors said Kryzie King, a family friend, admitted to torturing Myls.
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio orders investigation into death of Myls Dobson, 4-year-old boy who was beaten, tortured and starved by caregiver Kryzie King in a Midtown Manhattan apartment; King has been charged with assault and reckless endangerment, and is under investigation for murder.
lead_paragraph: As Mayor Bill de Blasio ordered an investigation into the death of Myls Dobson, 4, prosecutors said Kryzie King, a family friend, admitted to torturing Myls.

headline.main: Before His Death, Boy Faced Weeks of Abuse, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Before His Death, Boy Faced Weeks of Abuse, Officials Say
